showerReviews.reviewText: … ok? Disgusting behavior). Loud chatter in the sauna. Unsupervised children emptying the shower stall soap dispensers and foaming the whole floor. People not showering before entering the pool or whirl pool. Men wearing underwear as swim …

… of basic hygiene among some pool users is appalling. Many people don’t bother to shower before entering the pool, despite it being a standard hygiene practice (and usually a rule). Adding to this, I’ve noticed people wearing water sandals …

Policies not enforced : many people do not shower before to enter in the swimming pool, people wear clothes in the swimming pool, people bring their cell phone, go around the swimming pool with their shoes even with their baby carriage etc …

showerReviews.reviewText: This is a very nice, well maintained rec center. The exercise room is well lit, the basketball court is in very good condition. I went there for a friend's baby shower, and the room was a good size for the amount of people who attended.

… me on local community amenities. The building is spacious, with lots of conference rooms, a gym, senior activities, and tot programs. Plus access to shower and library DVD pick-up and drop-off. Just walking distance from plaza del mercado.
